Director: Sergei Artimovich
Cast: Elena Velikanova, Tatiana Konyukhov, Vera Sotnikova, Anatoly Lobotsky, Yuri Osipov, Inga Strelkova-Oboldina, Alexander Nazarov, Yuri Smirnov, Sergei Rubeko Paul Remezov.

The story of how three generations of women of the same family: mother, daughter and grandmother, look for happiness. Veronica, the mom, works in a large insurance company; daughter Dasha is a technical-college student. Often after school at the institute, she pops in on a visit to her grandmother - Yevgeniya Vasil. Although called her "grandmother," language does not do justice. At nearly 55 years, she is a superactive woman. Eugenia Vasilevny has a trivial hobby - ballroom dancing
